review_text: Very clean.
Clean, spacious, and located near several places. Less than $10 to Uber to casino. Definitely recommend.

This is a beautiful home. Very spacious without clutter. It was so clean but without artificial fragrances. Perfect for someone who is very sensitive to smells. The beds were also very comfortable. We all slept so peacefully.

Nice new home in Durant. Very clean and spacious. Would recommend to anyone looking for a night or a few nights to stay. It is in a rougher part of Durant but we had no issues with anything. Close to downtown and the casino.
We really enjoyed staying here. It was just as described and we would definitely stay here again.
The house is extremely clean and nice! Great place and will stay again next time we are in town!

Alondra's place was extremely clean. It was spacious and had everything we needed. Alondra was very responsive when we contacted her. The neighborhood is a little concerning upon arrival but we didn't have any issues.
Beautiful home. Neighborhood is less than desirable but home is fabulous. Would stay again.

Great place very clean
Would recommend and stay again
Thank you
Very clean house. I loved that it was so close to the choctaw casino.
really enjoyed staying here. I absolutely would come back. it is 8 minutes away from the choctaw casino. The place was incredibly clean and minimalistic. it was a perfect place!
New house very clean
great place to stay. very nice house. very clean. Host was very nice. location was ok. I would definitely recommend staying there. I will definitely stay again.
Updated and nice home. very clean.
Beautiful, looked brand new and spotless. Close to casino and concert. Thanks for sharing you new home with us.
Very nice and clean
Nice and clean in quiet area!
Beautiful home that is so clean! Loved the open layout and especially the Keurig! The decor was perfect for it making it feel like a very fancy place to stay!

The house was very clean and neat. The location is close to the Choctaw Casino in a very quiet neighborhood. Our host was very friendly and responded quickly to any questions I had. We greatly enjoyed our stay.

We stayed here when we went to the casino for a night. It is an easy 7 minute drive. The house itself is very new, nicely furnished with great A/C and comfy beds. And costs way less than the casino! Host responded to questions quickly. Even though the neighborhood has some rundown houses, this place worked great for us and we will use it again.

The most important part of my stay at any BNB is cleanliness. It was immaculate!!
Thank you very much for that.

Very clean place. Feels brand new. Thoughtful gift basket. The linens smelt freshly washed and clean!! The host was very flexible with check out as I needed to leave a little later than expected. Would absolutely stay here again.
Very nice and clean. New house.
This was perfect for our needs! It was close to where we needed to be with a nice comfortable bed and shower!
Great space for two. We had a wonderful time.

I’m so glad we found this place! It was perfect for us! Minutes from everything. Lots of businesses to walk to. Overall was quiet. Bed was very comfortable! We travel across the country and are always looking for quality extended stay locations. This was definitely that! Hosts were amazing to work with! We will be staying again in the future!
Dana was incredibly responsive, I asked for a can opener and she had it delivered within the hour. The place is spacious for one person, I felt comfortable for my stay.
Loved it.
nice quiet place. would go back
Very cute place
Great Place. Second time staying. Will stay again.
Great price and had all that I needed. Bed was comfortable and bathroom. had lots space, storage and outlets - was easy to get ready for plans. Dana was flexible, accommodating and quick to respond.
Perfect little place to stay .

My booking was last minute at 7:30 and Dana was wonderful with letting me know she had just cleaned and where her place was located. She also made sure I got into the place and if I needed anymore blankets or linens for the night which I thought was very thoughtful.
Great pace to stay.
Enjoyed our stay pleasant hosts!!
loved it!
Would stay here again . Love the privacy .

My stay here was safe & peaceful. I was traveling on a 13 week contract job and needed a place to stay during my time in Durant. The small place was great & felt like home. I give this place a 10/10 for recommendations to stay. Rick and Dana was very responsive and active and anything I needed they responded. The place was very clean and the photos are exactly how the home is. I will stay here again.
Just as described, very accommodating.

Loved my stay at the little cottage. Very quiet neighborhood, I felt at home and safe. The host was responsive and friendly, and gave clear instructions on how to get the house and how to get inside. Very comfortable stay! I enjoyed it very much. Thank you Rick & Dana!
Worked well for a weekend visit to Durant
enjoyed my stay thanks for the hospitality
Great place!
This is a nice cozy place to stay. I felt comfortable and safe. I will be booking again
Nice, quiet, clean renovated detached garage. It has everything you could need!
I was very surprised how spacious the space was! There was a big kitchen to make dishes and a place to do my work during my stay. The locating was good and quiet. I would highly recommend!
Great value and close to the Casino!
Repeat stay. Always a pleasure to be at Rick or Dana
Love this place. It’s second time we stayed. Quiet and comfortable. Great deal.

This was a great place to stay! I had a work project in Silo and Rick and Dana's place was only a short drive away. The small home is also within walking distance of a great little coffee shop. And Rick and Dana are excellent hosts. I think those bed sheets were the softest sheets I've ever slept on. I will definitely be staying again if I am back in Durant!
The place was really great and the hosts were really great as well. I would love to stay with them again.
Rick and Dana's place was just what I needed for my quick stay in Durant. They were very friendly and accommodating! Thank you.
Very nice hosts with good communication and willingness to assist with any needs. The bed was very comfortable. Sheets felt like a fancy hotel. The keurig coffee was good too.

It’s a tiny little cottage. Perfect for a sleep over for a day or two. It’s older and lock on door needs a slight adjustment. It’s in an older neighborhood but close to casino and a restaurant we like. Better than the hotel we used in the past. I will use again.
I had a great stay at Rick and Dana's. Rick and Dana were very easy to work with, their property was clean and they were very responsive.
Good place, nice people

Rick and Dana were so awesome! The location was perfect. It was clean and cozy and looked exactly like the photos. It had everything I needed. Halfway through my weeklong stay, my plans got changed, and I needed to leave a couple of days early. I reached out to them and they were able to accommodate those changes so I was able to get some of that money refunded. Would recommend to anyone!
Great location. Clean and comfortable and hosts were easy to communicate with.
our stay for secluded and exactly what we needed. communication was on point. would stay here again.

Nice.and clean.
We stayed gone most of the time, but liked the location and a quiet area
Would definitely recommend or rebook in the future!
It was a cozy place to stay with privacy. Rick Dana were helpful. We had everything we coukd need during our stay.
Me and my family enjoyed staying there, 10/10 would recommend

This was a great place for our stay in Durant. The house was very clean , big kitchen with great amenities only wish there had been a table to be able to seat and eat any meals. The bathroom was very clean and roomy. Very quite neighborhood and easy access to everything in the area. Very likely to stay there again on next visit to Durant. Thank you Rick and Dana for being a great host.
A pleasant stay, will definitely return if back in the neighborhood!
Great place to stay in Durant! Close to the casino and awesome donut shop nearby! Has everything you need for a long stay.
This was a great location with everything I needed. Hope to stay again next time I’m in town.
Clean and as advertised with all the essentials.
Perfect small place for my work trip related visits.

We had a nice stay at Rick and Dana’s place. It was spacious and clean. It was a little chilly upon arrival and with a little checking with them, we were able to plug in and turn on the space heaters which warmed us up nicely. They turned a garage space into a cute and spacious place for guests.

This place was perfect for our little weekend get away. We came to play at the casino and it was the perfect house for us to rest and relax. The Magnolia Cafe was great for breakfast! Highly recommend!!!
Clean, cozy and had everything you would need, just like a hotel.
Such a wonderful and delightful place to stay. Great place, great host and so affordable!
Place was very quaint. Had more amenities than we needed. Owners were easily reachable and quick with responses.
Rick and Dana were very kind when we accidentally locked ourselves out.

Definitely worth the price! I loved it so much I’m actually coming back this week. Best part they have a washer and dryer! It is tucked away down an alley but if you have any trouble they will gladly help you find it. They had a space heater in every room and I absolutely loved it. Thank you guys!!
This place was exactly as described. Easy to find and worked perfectly for what I needed.
better than staying in any motel

This was a great place to stay. It was clean, had all the needed amenities and the host was responsive. It is located in a convenient location. Had a slight issue finding it but I think that was just because I checked in after dark, the hosts was quick to reply and provide further instructions.
Thank you, Rick and Dana! it was exactly what I needed and more for my brief stay in Durant. I will definitely try to stay here again when I come down next time.

Plain and simple in Durant:
The accommodations are as described and pictured in the listing, nothing fancy but functional and equipped with everything necessary for our short stay. The neighborhood was quiet and not very far from downtown and local attractions. The hosts are very responsive and return emails within the hour.
Very nice, and clean place. I enjoyed my stay.

Rick and Dana are great hosts!
The house is cozy and clean. Great cost-benefit.
So nice and helpful!
Rick and Dana were great hosts. We didn’t stay long but check in was super easy and we were not bothered the entire time. Definitely recommend, as I probably will be back in the future.
Very nice place to stay for the night, especially for the price! Thank you!
Cute little house. Safe area.

Rick and Dana were extremely accommodating. Especially when my plans unexpectedly changed. Just that alone made all the difference in my trip!! They responded right away. The place was clean and exactly what I needed!!!
Amazing quiet little property

After checking in, there were a few hiccups in the evening that were quickly resolved.
Great place to stay, located close to Main Street, plenty of parking and room to move around inside the AirBnB. Well stocked with towels, dishes, etc. Priced right for the accommodations. The shower had plenty of hot water and water pressure.
Bring a beside clock if you want to know the time in the middle of the night. We felt like we were in Vegas with no clocks anywhere.
Rick and Dana were very pleasant to work with and we would recommend a stay here!
We will be back!
Cozy clean nice decor

The place is a garage converted into a cozy apartment has everything you need including a washer and dryer also was very well constructed!! I fully recommend this place for anyone looking for a B&B for a notes stay!!!!!
Was perfect

My husband and I had a good stay overall. This little house was the perfect size for a quick weekend trip. It does not have central heat and air but they provided space heaters for the bedroom and bathroom and there is a unit in the main room. We were very comfortable the whole time. Clean fridge and shower. (There is a BIG step getting in and out of the bath/shower which might be difficult for older folks or people with disabilities.) A washer and dryer are provided. Very quick and easy drive to the casino! We will definitely stay again next time we come back to go to the casino. Very responsive and friendly hosts.
I stayed here twice, and it was great! Would recommend!
Stayed here twice and it was great! Would recommend!

Hidden gem! Loved our stay at this charming and cozy location! The full kitchen was a huge plus and it's proximity to both the casino and downtown was absolutely perfect!! Will absolutely stay again! Hosts are great, friendly and easy to get a hold of if you need anything!
Cute and quiet little spot

This property was a total Diamond In The Ruff! Everything was even better in person and all of the littl things you miss from home were present. Great job on property and nice area. Very quiet and cozy! Will defineately book again.
We only stayed one night but everything was clean and tidy and was super easy to check in and check out! Definitely worth the stay!
Great stay, would stay here again! Thanks, Mona!
A lovely place to stay while visiting Durant!
This Backyard Beauty is stunning. The house is beautifully maintained both inside and out! Worth every penny. Would recommend 100% and will stay again if passing through again!
It's a great private retreat—a wonderful alternative to staying in a hotel.
Nice stay in a quiet, safe and clean environment. Enjoyed it!
Awesome place to stay!
Homey and comfortable. Appreciated the snacks and coffee!
BEAUTIFUL PROPERTY! We loved absolutely everything more than we expected, very clean and quiet, we want to return. Thank you
Easy in, easy out really convenient. Nice guest house, just as described. Mona is a great host. We'll go back again.

So blessed to be able to stay in a beautiful gated estate like this the guest house was immaculate, and just as described. Mona was so proactive giving us instructions and what to be aware of and places to eat we will stay here every time we come through Durant Oklahoma
Great place! We will stay again!
Perfect for a peaceful retreat or staycation. Very comfortable and close to downtown. Definitely recommend!

This guesthouse is excellent. Spacious, efficiently laid out and well appointed. Handy to everything in town.
Mona was great. Had plenty of snacks and beverages. Inquired about all my needs and sent Charlie the Pug over for companionship as needed.
"I'll be back."
Enjoyed our stay!

I absolutely loved staying at Mona's. The location is great and was very convenient to the different places I needed to be during my stay. The area is very peaceful and quiet which was lovely. This is a weird compliment, but the AC system was set perfectly. I did not need to adjust it at all and was quite comfortable throughout my stay, a minor miracle for someone who is always cold! The kitchen is great with a full size fridge and a wine fridge so you can separate party from business, if need be. Also: multiple coffee solutions! I look forward to staying here again in the future. The only downside: I never met the pugs! Maybe next time? Thank you so much for hosting, it was great!
Lovely guest house in the giant backyard of a beautiful home in a gorgeous neighborhood. Ideal place to stay for a weekend in Durant.
I had business at Choctaw casino. Stayed only 8min from the casino in a cute little guesthouse. Would book again!
We enjoyed our stay at Mona's. It had all the little things that make you feel right at home. Cute place.

When you stay at this lovely little cottage, you will feel at home. The place has charm that few places good rival. It felt way better than a hotel, yet having all the niceties that a hotel would. I wish I could capture the true essence of how the experience was with more descriptive words!
This was perfect for what we needed! It was a quick stay, but super cute and clean. Would definitely stay again!
Our stay was great. Extremely pet friendly, very quiet & met all of our expectations. We will probably stay there again.
Place was great!
Was a great quick trip

We stayed here when we came for a concert at the casino. Great quiet place to stay. Nice touches like coffee, plenty of towels and toiletries.
10 minute drive to casino, straight drive there.
Very clean and just as described!
Mona’s place was perfect for what we needed. Definitely would stay again!
Very private in a gated community.
We loved Mona's little house. So comfortable, very private, quiet, and beautiful. We will definitely be back the next time we visit Durant.

We stayed at Mona's place when we were in town to see the Third Eye Blind concert at the casino. The location was really nice, clean and comfortable and we would stay here again. The property is dog friendly and makes me think it's time to get a Labrador to bring on fun weekend trips like this.

I’ve stayed in AirBnB’s from Vietnam to Europe and throughout US. I found Mona’s attention to detail excellent. One of if not the best I have experienced. Gated community with beautiful homes and easy access. Only 10 minutes to the Casino were we attended a concert. From snacks and coffee to every amenity needed and excellent quality linens. Things like easy to use guest login for Netflix to a comfy blanket to watch TV with. I especially liked the frosted mug in the freezer and cold beer in the refrigerator on arrival! Mona! Well done!
Loved our stay at this Air bnb! So clean and perfect for my boyfriend and I.
This was a great place to stay for a small weekend getaway!

Mona is as a fantastic host, her place was beautiful and very clean. She had just about everything you would need for a little getaway. I thought she went above and beyond with leaving snacks and wine, I will make sure and book here EVERY time I come to Durant. Thanks again!

This was a fantastic stay! I really loved that it was a private guest house, rather than a room in someone’s house. Everything was clean, spacious, bed was comfy, shower was hot. I’ll definitely be looking to stay here if I come back to Durant and recommending this place to anyone I can!
Mona's place was great. Clean, tidy and quaint. We forgot something in the fridge and Mona let us come back and get it with no hassle. We would stay there again.
We will definitely keep Mona in mind on our future trips to visit our daughter. She has the perfect place for a quick get away. Would recommend her space over any hotel in the area.

I loved Mona’s place. I wish I could’ve stayed longer. It was perfect!! Very quiet. It was just what I needed!! I look forward to staying again. Mona was amazing! She always answers my many questions very quickly. Didn’t matter what the questions were. I liked the little patio area in the back. I was able to sit out there and so some work that I had to bring with me. Thank you for a beautiful stay!!
Thanks Mona you have a really nice place and location. Great experience for us.
Loved our stay. Mona was very responsive and made check-in and out easy.
Mona’s place was perfect! Quiet with beautiful scenery just out the back door. Perfect place for morning coffee.
Great spot and very enjoyable for a little getaway!!
Excellent choice. Private and spacious
Beautiful place to stay! Mona is a wonderful host!

House was clean and had comfortable beds. Home is located on a dead end road with no other homes around, across the railroad tracks. Plenty of parking and room outside the home, with a large sitting deck. Would stay again if or when we visit Durant!
Great place, would stay again!
Beautiful home ! I would definitely stay again.
Great house! Lots of fun activities!
Very nice house. Great stay.
House was very clean, spacious and very close to our venue. Beautiful home which we of booked a longer stay.

House is decorated cute and comfortable. Kitchen was not functional for cooking. Had one disgusting old pot and nothing else to cook with. Dishwasher did not work. Appliances were otherwise really nice. It is very close to railroad tracks but they supplied ear plugs. Would also be nice if you could enter from the front as it was muddy to get to back door.

Beautiful home. Kaine was very responsive and accommodating. Two issues I had: the heat was difficult to control. We could adjust the temperature; however, it would be stifling hot in some of the bedrooms, but very cool in other areas. The second issue was out of their control. We were very close to train tracks that seem to have a train pass every few hours, even during the middle of the night. It seemed to rattle the entire house, and the train whistle was very loud. Despite the train and heater issue, we would stay there again.
Such a great airbnb! Super close to the casino. Very spacious.

We all loved the house. Very spacious with plenty of room for 7 people. The host was very friendly and responsive. Wished that we could have stayed longer. We didn’t even mind the trains. The house is very close to the Choctaw casino which was the main reason we chose this house (very easy to get there). My only suggestion would be to have a few more ear plugs (there was only 1 pair) for guests who don’t want to hear the trains at while trying to sleep. Also, we didn’t have any dish detergent pods. Other than that, the house is lovely!

Communication was exceptional. Two minor issues with water and trash pick-up were taken care of with an hours' time.
The only thing the listing stated about the active train was that the railroad track was located near the house. Actually, the tracks are actually about 30 yards in front of the house. The train goes by twice every two hours, 24-hours a day. And it almost always pulled more than 100 cars. The entrance to the property has a private railroad crossing with no warning lights or retractable barrier so the conductor blasts the train horn before approaching the crossing. My guests and I never got used to the train horn.
was good!
Beautiful place! Felt right at home and fit all of our needs for the stay! Will keep this place in mind if we ever come back to Oklahoma.
Comfy and clean farmhouse. Host was very responsive to our needs. Very conveniently located to the casino.
Everything was good except the master bed. The frame need to be replaced.
This house is a great place to stay. Plenty of room, and very clean. If you’re going to the casino it’s perfect. It’s less than a 5 minute drive. Will definitely be back!
Great place to stay, the kids loved the train.
Nice and clean.

This place was a wonderful place to stay. Right by the casino but excluded from the noise when we wanted to relax. The house was gorgeous and very comfortable. Our group will definitely be staying again in the future
Great place
Being close to the casino was a huge plus, the place was very clean and nice. Instructions were very clear.

Clean home, great location! Plenty of space for our group made for a comfy stay at the house. Plenty of parking, which was nice. We didn’t use them, but there was also cool amenities like a disc golf basket, corn toss boards, and more. This was a great place to stay and I’ll certainly be looking to make this an annual stay if possible.
Great place and great host. Close to cansino and town. Would highly recommend to stay.
Absolutely enjoyed our stay. And very short drive to the casino! We will be back when we’re in the area. 😊
Great communication. Very Clean nice place.
Great place.
Can’t say it enough. Our guys love this house while they work at the Choctaw casino. Great communication and house has everything they need.
What a great stay. Great host and communication. thank you
Our employees love this house while they work at Choctaw Casino. Kaine was very fast and pleasant with communication. The house is beautiful and clean with everything they need during their stay.
Kaine was a great host. We booked a night at two different houses on his property. Great family weekend getaway for our large family.
Great stay in a great location! A beautiful home, within minutes from the casino! Definitely worth the stay!
Great place to stay and everything was as advertised.
Great place! Really nice inside and close to the casino!
Great home layout for a comfortable stay!

I thought it was great. But i have severe allergies to fragrances and there was a plug in which i disconnected but somehow it still made my sinuses swell up. Also i took my 18 month old twins and the floor is wood and them running around on it was so loud. Not a big deal to me but the rest of my fam had a hard time sleeping.
Great stay! Thanks for having us!
Great house for our employees to stay after long days at a jobsite nearby. Fast communication and a beautiful home. Just what they needed along with a nice pond where they caught fish and relaxed.

Was traveling from south Texas to north Oklahoma and found this place for a one night stay and I’m glad I made the choice. The house was immaculate inside and very clean. My family was impressed, and if I visit the nearby casinos, I would stay here again.

Why pay $500 a night for a single room at the casino when you can rent this entire 4 bedroom 3 bath place for less? Fantastic value and super close to the casino. Very private. Exceeded our expectations in every way!
Pictures do not do this place justice!! Beautiful place and close to Choctaw. Kaine is very responsive!! Will highly recommend this place and will probably be booking again!

Perfect for big group. 3 minute drive from Choctaw Casino (back road driving do not need to get onto interstate). Private/safe space. Beds are super comfortable! Lots of extra linens/ towels. The bathrooms are very spacious. full kitchen with all supplies needed. very clean throughout!!!! We loved making a fire and watching the train! Very great experience. The host responded very quickly and so kind, helpful, and accommodating . Will book again when visiting Choctaw Casino.
The house is great and perfect for anyone going to the casino. The perfect home for anyone with a big party. We have stayed multiple times and no problems. Would still come again and recommend.
The Rail House was a beautiful and comfortable place to stay! Neat, clean, and everything you could need or want.
Perfect place to stay for casino fun! Will be back again!
Kaine's place is awesome! Plenty of room in a great house on a great property.

The house is very spacious and comfortable, great for our family gathering. It's also located very close to the casino hotel and Choctaw convention center. We had a wonderful time and appreciated this comfortable house.
Very clean and nicely decorated! Very close to the Casino.
Great place! Very close to the casino and easy access to town. The home was very accommodating and perfect for our group. Would book again!
We stay in air b and b’s every week while traveling. This place was spacious and private, best around!
loved our stay. super clean, super close to casino and very private. great communication from host as well. 5 stars
Cute house, very comfortable, lots if space in the living and dinning rooms, plus, plenty of room on the deck if you have a large group. We enjoyed our stay.

The house was just as beautiful and clean as it shows in the listing. The casino was right down the street which was very nice. Kaine was very communicative with us. The train is very close to the house, but we thought it was fun and different. It wasn't a bother at all. The only criticism I would say is the front door was not working well and my husband had to walk up the deck stairs and unlock the back door and then let us in the front door. He then let us out the front door and locked it behind us and had to go out the back door again and meet us at the car. Kaine did offer to fix it during our stay which was very kind. Just know that that back entrance has multiple stairs and the front entrance has a huge step up so it was very hard for my 76 year old dad to get in and out of the front door because he uses a walker and is a fall risk. Besides that, the place is just fabulous!
It was a great place overall. No complaints.
Great place, ideal for casino events.
Great location and stay! Very charming aesthetic, and great amenities. Location was fantastic as well. Would recommend!
Enjoyed the stay. Was perfect for our golf/casino trip. Yard games were fun. Plenty of bathrooms and showers for 8 guests. Casino is a short 3 min drive away.
My family enjoyed our visit in your lovely home. It was spacious and comfortable for all of us. The train didn’t bother everyone but if you’re a light sleeper like me, you may need ear plugs.

This house was perfect for our girls weekend. Check in and out was easy. Location to the casino was great. Beds and linens were so comfortable. It was very clean. Plenty of bathrooms so everyone could easily get ready for the evening. The privacy without neighbors was nice as well.
Exceptional host, lovely home!

This is home is a great meeting spot and has plenty of space for a small get together of 8 people. The beds were comfortable. And everything was laid out very well. Super close to the casino and pretty much anything in Durant. If anyone worries about being so close to the train, I wouldn’t worry about it. After I went to bed I never heard the train

The house was very nice. It was located on private land. The kids love seeing the train, and there is a fence in between the tracks and the house. The backyard is big and the deck also. The host Kaine kept in touch to see if we needed anything.So I would recommend if you want to get away this is the place

The home, location and the host was beyond 5 star!!! The house is absolutely beautiful and you cannot get a better location this close to the casino!!. Communication was super fast and they were great hosts and we will definitely be back!!!!!

Kaine was a great host. Communication was on point. House was comfortable and clean. Close proximity to the casino which was convenient. Pond on property has crappie and bass. Had a great time and will be back! Definitely recommend!
Meticulously maintained home with a great location!
Clean, cozy and close to Choctaw Casino. We stayed one night after concert at casino and were very pleased with the amenities. Owner was quick to respond to questions and check-in/out was easy.
Great place to stay for a short trip to the casino. The house was clean and well taken care of.
Great space and great location. Clean, private, and spacious. Perfect for a weekend getaway. Proximity to the casino is ideal.

If your looking to get away and not be in a neighborhood, this place is wonderful! Easy access and is really close to the casino. Peaceful location and everything is updated! This gave us a cozy warm feeling on a cold day!
Perfect stay! Third time using this AirBnB and it has been awesome!

It was our second stay at this location, and it was a hit once again. The four bedroom layout worked great for our group. The kids enjoyed the space outside to run around, the frisbee golf, the oversized jenga, and cornhole. The common areas are spacious and well-appointed. The kitchen is outfitted with what you need to prepare meals, and it has a Keurig. The house is also conveniently located next to the Choctaw casino and close to Durant proper. It is our go-to place in Durant when visiting family.
Kaine, is great I was on tight schedule he worked me in. This is the second time I’ve stayed at Kaine’s railway house and it has been on point.
Awesome experience...would stay there again in a heart beat.

Enjoyed our stay! Great hosts ♥️
House was nicely decorated and accommodating.
Super close to casino!
Super cute spot, nice and big, fast response when I had a question!!

Excellent location to the Choctaw casino. Clean, nice updates and accommodating property manager. The property is right off the main highway and you must observe a railroad crossing that runs along side of the property.
House was just right for our weekend trip. It was only .5 miles from the Casio. House was amazing and our host answered all our questions right away.
Great stay!
Great home, beautiful. Easy to get to & from the casino. I would definitely recommend it to anyone.

Outside needs a bit of work, but once you are inside you’ll feel very comfortable, very clean and nice decor throughout. Wish we could have stayed longer to seat out and enjoy the fire pit. 3 min. Ride to the casino. Train was cool to watch from the porch. Definitely recommend!
This place is amazing. Beautiful and quiet time enjoyed the fishing.
The house is beautiful and very clean. Plenty of space to move around. Kaine was very accommodating and communicative. It was a pleasure to stay here
Great house. Very clean and comfortable. Very close to casino. Overall great stay!
Great place. They provide lots of activities to do.
Nice place in really close proximity to the casino. We will be back
Great place highly recommend it to anyone that has any business to do or fun to have in Choctaw.
Beautiful place! This place was way nicer than the pictures even showed. Beautifully remodeled. Plenty of space. Extremely clean! Was great for the whole family.
Convenient to Casino. Good AC.

I highly recommend this place it’s a Great house! Second time staying there and it’s so comfy and feels like home. Very easy commute to the casino which is like 2 minutes away!
The owners are very good at responding and accommodating.
Very clean and nice on the inside. Very convenient location to the casino. We will stay here again!

The house is absolutely amazing. It is almost literally in the shadow of the Choctaw casino, and it is not far from stores and restaurants in Durant. The owner clearly put a lot of effort in making sure that the house is comfortable for guests. The furniture was all nice, the beds and linens were comfortable, and the entertainment items such as frisbee golf, corn hole, and fishing pond were fun for the kids. The kitchen has all nice and new appliances, the washer and dryer were helpful to have, and the televisions were all modern and functioning. Our family of five stayed at James's farmhouse for a weekend. From the moment we arrived we felt welcome and comfortable. The space was beautifully decorated, perfectly clean, and well equipped. We especially appreciated these special touches: farm fresh eggs, k-cup espresso machine, sounder/night lights in each bedroom, comfortable and spacious beds (one king sized bed, one queen and a handy pack-in-play for our little one), heavy curtains conducive to a good night's rest, and a luxurious shower. Our kids enjoyed getting outside to run and play, visit the chickens (next to the farmhouse), and hanging out at the little playground and trampoline by the pond (which was within walking distance from the farmhouse). If you enjoy dogs, you will love their friendly dog Ranger who will be eager to greet you as you spend time outside. There were multiple hiking options within 30 minutes to an hour away. We chose to spend an afternoon in Denison at Waterloo Lake Regional Park; it was great for our kids (all under age 5). James and his family were outstanding hosts. Five stars!

we couldn't ask for anything better than what we experience during our stay, love the place so much that we are looking forward to our next stay and if weather permits we are able to enjoy the outdoors as much.
